janapathi kabinat mandalayata kiyayikabinat mandalaya pasugiya brahaspathinda mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage pradhanathwayen janadhipathi lekam karyalayedi raswuna.ethanadi wisheshayenma awadhanaya yomu wune 2008 anka 14 darana kramopaya sanwardhana wyapruthi (sanshodhana) panatha yatathe hotal wyapruthiwalata adalawa idiripath kala kabinat pathrikawa pilibandawayi.kabinat mandala raswima aarambha wimata tika welawakata prathama mema kabinat pathrikawata adalawa wadidura karunu saha kondesi athulath warthawak kabinat amathyawarunta laba dila thibuna.
